mapper.insert: insert into Product (P_ID, P_SEQ, P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_CONTENT, P_STOCK, P_IMG) values (#{P_ID}, P_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{P_NAME}, #{P_PRICE}, #{P_CONTENT}, #{P_STOCK}, #{P_IMG})
mapper.select: select P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_IMG from Product
select P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_CONTENT, P_STOCK from Product where P_ID = #{P_ID}
mapper.update: update Product set P_NAME = #{P_NAME}, P_PRICE = #{P_PRICE}, P_CONTENT = #{P_CONTENT}, P_STOCK = #{P_STOCK}, P_IMG = #{P_IMG} where P_ID = #{P_ID}
